text: the Amazon Web Services City on a cloud
innovation challenge is an opportunity
for public sector organizations to
demonstrate how they are going above and
beyond to innovate for the residents and
improve service delivery receive up to
$50,000 in AWS promotional credits
support and training to bring your idea
to the next level moving to AWS has been
the best thing that we've done switching
to AWS cloud I am saving about 1.7 1.8
million each year just on the data
center alone AWS is helping local and
regional governments innovate by
simplifying IT workloads and enabling
next generation constituent services AWS
specifically has helped us get our data
out into more hands we launched our
alexis skill and over the first few
months on average we're saving about 10
hours of staff time answering kind of
basic level questions that the citizens
can now just ask Alexa by merging all
that data together within our AWS group
service we're hoping to be able to see
that baseline so that as we introduce or
change services we can see how the
outcomes are affected and then tailor
the services so that we get the best
outcomes possible how can the cloud
impact your constituents tell us your
story for a chance to win up to $50,000
in credits financial support and
training
